simple.gui.container

Class RadioButtonGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.gui.container.RadioButtonGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, ItemSelectable, EventListener

    public class RadioButtonGroup
extends Object
implements ActionListener, ItemSelectable
    Simple spinoff of ButtonGroup.
    Manages JRadioButtons allowing only one to be selected at a time.
    Created: 2005
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kenneth Pierce
    See Also:
    ButtonGroup

      • RadioButtonGroup

        public RadioButtonGroup()

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(JRadioButton rb)
        Adds rb to the group and checks to see if it is set as selected. If it is then it is set as the currently selected radio button.
        Parameters:
        rb -

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)

      • addItemListener

      • getSelected

        public JRadioButton getSelected()
        Returns:
        The currently selected radio button.

      • setSelected

        public void setSelected(int i)
        Sets the radiobutton at index i as selected. Does nothing if i < 0 or > the number of radiobuttons.
        Parameters:
        i - Index of JRadioButton to be selected.

      • setSelected

        public void setSelected(JRadioButton rb)
        Sets rb as the currently selected radio button.
        Parameters:
        rb -
